articles.title: Stuart Broad gets emotional standing ovation and guard of honour from Australia after retirement...
articles.description: Stuart Broad was given an incredible standing ovation by the crowd at The Oval as he came out to bat for the final time. Broad unexpectedly announced his retirement from cricket on Saturday night. …
articles.content:
Stuart Broad was given an incredible standing ovation by the crowd at The Oval as he came out to bat for the final time.
Broad unexpectedly announced his retirement from cricket on Saturday night.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
